column1: Digital Humanities Institute - Beirut 2015 crowdsourced English-Arabic wordlist
A language for the digital humanities has never really been articulated by the community.
Help us build a bilingual digital humanities handlist.  Be the first to coin new terms!  I have added some from the titles of the activities from our schedule.
